item.title: Human experience for Transhuman
item.description: -- Human experience for Transhuman Speculative Design | 2018, Academic Work | ONGOING Concept XHuman: Educational Headset for transhumans to Experience “Human” in 2075 XHuman is an educational headset for transhumans who inplants superintelligence into their left brain. This gadget stimulates your brain electrically and temporarily stops the neurotransmission between the brain chip and the brain. This feature enables transhumans to think as “Humans”. Since transhuman’s brain chip is implanted in your left brain (work for language, memory, calculation), so be sure to wear it on the left brain.
